name: Format HTML page

name: Add response headers
func:
msg.headers = { "Content-Security-Policy": "frame-src heart.museuminabox.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'", "Content-Type": "text/html" };
return msg;

name: Build URL
Add warning if box ID already set
Add warning if box ID already set
Report errors
func:
msg.statusCode = 400;
return msg;

name: Build update URL
func:
msg.url = "https://heart.museuminabox.org/api/upgrade/"+context.global.software_version;
return msg;

name: Updates all okay (either no update, or it succeeded)
Give the script time to save
Add response headers
func:
msg.headers = { "Content-Security-Policy": "script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'", "Content-Type": "text/html" };
return msg;

name: Format HTML page
template:
Museum in a Box Advanced WiFi Configuration

Enter the details for your WiFi network below. If you do not have a username and password or a hidden network for your WiFi, then use the basic WiFi setup page instead.

I have an Enterprise WPA or 802.1x wifi network:




I have a wifi network with a hidden SSID:

name: Format HTML page
template:
Museum in a Box Wifi Saved

You Wifi details have been saved.

In a moment you will be disconnected from the MuseumInABox Wifi network so that your box can try to use the new Wifi settings. Your box will tell you if it works or not (it might take up to two minutes).

name: Add response headers
func:
msg.headers = { "Content-Security-Policy": "script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'", "Content-Type": "text/html" };
return msg;

name: Format 802.1x WiFi details file
template:
[connection]
id={{payload.ssid}}
uuid={{payload.uuid}}
type=wifi
permissions=

[wifi]
mode=infrastructure
ssid={{payload.ssid}}

[wifi-security]
key-mgmt=wpa-eap

[802-1x]
eap=peap;
identity={{payload.userid}}
password={{payload.passwd}}
phase2-auth=mschapv2

[ipv4]
dns-search=
method=auto

[ipv6]
addr-gen-mode=stable-privacy
dns-search=
method=auto
